==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|しも|に|だん|かつ|よう|yomi=y}}
A compound of {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|下二段|tr=shimo nidan||lower bigrade}} and {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|活用|tr=katsuyō||conjugation}}. Lower bigrade verbs eventually change into [[下一段活用|lower monograde]]. Lower refers to the -e- suffix and contrasts with the [[上二段活用|upper]] -i-, while bigrade refers to the two-way e/u variation.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|しも にだん かつよう|acc=6|acc_ref=DJR|y=y}}
